glosses: crow, any bird, usually black, of the genus Corvus, having a strong conical beak, with projecting bristles

etymology:
Inherited from Ottoman Turkish قارغه (karga), from Old Anatolian Turkish قَارْغَه (qarġa), from Proto-Turkic *karga (“crow”).
Cognates
Cognate with Azerbaijani qarğa, Bashkir ҡарға (qarğa), Kazakh қарға (qarğa), Kyrgyz карга (karga), Tatar карга (qarğa), Turkmen garga, Uyghur قاغا (qagha) and Uzbek qargʻa.
